code: var ADD_NEW_POST='ADD-NEW-POST';var ONE_BY_ONE_CHARACHTERS_ENTERING='ONE-BY-ONE-CHARACHTERS-ENTERING';export var currentValueOfTextArea='';var initialState={posts:[{id:1,text:"Hey, world! I use a LC to save a moments dear to my heart.",comments:[{id:1,text:"Wow, it's so cool, dude. "},{id:2,text:"Good luck!"}]}]};export var ProfileReducer=function ProfileReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ONE_BY_ONE_CHARACHTERS_ENTERING:currentValueOfTextArea=action.desiredValue;return state;case ADD_NEW_POST:var count=state.posts.length;var item={id:count,text:action.desiredValue,comments:[]};state.posts.push(item);currentValueOfTextArea='';return state;default:return state;}};export var addNewPostActionCreator=function addNewPostActionCreator(desiredValue){return{type:ADD_NEW_POST,desiredValue:desiredValue};};export var oneByOneCharachtersEnteringActionCreator=function oneByOneCharachtersEnteringActionCreator(desiredValue){return{type:ONE_BY_ONE_CHARACHTERS_ENTERING,desiredValue:desiredValue};};
